sentences.en: A bare trustee is a mere passive depositary.
sentences.cn: 被动受托人只不过是消极受托人.

sentences.en: A trustee is a member of managing business affairs of an institution.
sentences.cn: 理事是机构管理班子中的成员.

sentences.en: A trustee owes several duties to the beneficiary or beneficiaries.
sentences.cn: 受托人对受益人负有多项义务.

sentences.en: A trustee shall be appointed to manage enterprise pensions ( Article 15 ).
sentences.cn: 应指定受托人管理企业年金 ( 第15条 ).

sentences.en: Between settlor and trustee, due to the establishment of the trust.
sentences.cn: 一因信讬行为成立,委讬人与受讬人间.

sentences.en: I received a letter from my trustee at the bank.
sentences.cn: 我得到我银行里财产保管人的一封信.

sentences.en: Legal ownership rests with the trustee, and equitable ownership rests with the beneficiary.
sentences.cn: 受托人享有普通法上的所有权, 受益人享有衡平法了的所有权.

sentences.en: The court have to act because of the incapacity of the trustee.
sentences.cn: 因为受托人无法律上的行为能力,法院不得不采取行动.

sentences.en: The document also inaccurately described a trustee that safeguards invested assets.
sentences.cn: 文件对保护这些资产安全的托管公司的描述也不准确.

sentences.en: The trust legal relation includes the tripartite party: client, trustee and beneficiary.
sentences.cn: 信托法律关系包括三方当事人: 委托人 、 受托人和受益人.

sentences.en: The trustee is the person to whom the trust property is given.
sentences.cn: 受托人是指财产接受者.

sentences.en: The trustee must manage the trust property for the beneficiary.
sentences.cn: 受托人必须受益人管理信托财产.

sentences.en: The trustee owes a duty of care to beneficiaries.
sentences.cn: 受托人对受益人负谨慎义务.

sentences.en: The trustee, as such, is fat and pompous and benevolent.
sentences.cn: 所谓理事, 应当肥胖,傲慢,一副慈善模样.

sentences.en: The trustees of your pension fund decide which fund manager will invest some or all of your future income.
sentences.cn: 你的养老基金的受托人决定哪一位基金经理将投资你部分或所有的未来收入。

sentences.en: Why him? He can be trusted. How does one become a trustee?
sentences.cn: 为什么是他? 他可以被信任,怎样可以被信任?

words.tran_cn: 托管；托管制度；托管人职责；托管领土

trans.tran_cn: 受托人，信托公司，（公司、学院）理事，（慈善事业或其他机构的）受托人
trans.tran_en: someone who has control of money or property that is in a  trust  for someone else

trans.tran_cn: 移交（财产或管理权）给受托人
